text: Craig Phillips (born 16 October 1971) is an English builder. He won the first season of Big Brother UK in 2000. He appeared in many television series since then and has done charity work, including creating a charity single. Phillips also donated the Â£70,000 money prize of his win to his friend who had down syndrome. == Sources == Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:English television personalities
title: Craig Phillips
